executable.title: Resample Scalar/Vector/DWI Volume
executable.description:
This module implements image and vector-image resampling through the use of itk Transforms.It can also handle diffusion weighted MRI image resampling. "Resampling" is performed in space coordinates, not pixel/grid coordinates. It is quite important to ensure that image spacing is properly set on the images involved. The interpolator is required since the mapping from one space to the other will often require evaluation of the intensity of the image at non-grid positions. 

Warning: To resample DWMR Images, use nrrd input and output files. 

Warning: Do not use to resample Diffusion Tensor Images, tensors would not be reoriented

parameters.label: Transform Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters used to transform the input image into the output image

image.name: deffield
image.label: Deformation Field Volume
image.description: File containing the deformation field (3D vector image containing vectors with 3 components)

string-enumeration.name: typeOfField
string-enumeration.description: Set if the deformation field is an h-Field
string-enumeration.label: Displacement or H-Field

string-enumeration.name: interpolationType
string-enumeration.description: Sampling algorithm (linear or nn (nearest neighborhoor), ws (WindowedSinc), bs (BSpline) )
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation

parameters.label: Advanced Transform Parameters
parameters.description: Those parameters should normally not be modified

string-enumeration.name: transformsOrder
string-enumeration.description: Select in what order the transforms are read
string-enumeration.label: Transforms Order

boolean.name: notbulk
boolean.description: The transform following the BSpline transform is not set as a bulk transform for the BSpline transform
boolean.label: Not a Bulk Transform

boolean.name: space
boolean.description: Space Orientation between transform and image is different (RAS/LPS) (warning: if the transform is a Transform Node in Slicer3, do not select)
boolean.label: Space Orientation inconsistency (between transform and image)

point.name: rotationPoint
point.description: Rotation Point in case of rotation around a point (otherwise useless)
point.label: Rotation Point

boolean.name: centeredTransform
boolean.description: Set the center of the transformation to the center of the input image
boolean.label: Centered Transform

string-enumeration.name: imageCenter
string-enumeration.description: Image to use to center the transform (used only if "Centered Transform" is selected)
string-enumeration.label: Image Center

boolean.name: inverseITKTransformation
boolean.description: Inverse the transformation before applying it from output image to input image
boolean.label: Inverse ITK Transformation

double-vector.name: outputImageSpacing
double-vector.description: Spacing along each dimension (0 means use input spacing)
double-vector.label: Spacing

double-vector.name: outputImageSize
double-vector.description: Size along each dimension (0 means use input size)
double-vector.label: Size

double-vector.name: directionMatrix
double-vector.description: 9 parameters of the direction matrix by rows (ijk to LPS if LPS transform, ijk to RAS if RAS transform)
double-vector.label: Direction Matrix

integer.name: numberOfThread
integer.description: Number of thread used to compute the output image
integer.label: Number Of Thread

double.name: defaultPixelValue
double.description: Default pixel value for samples falling outside of the input region
double.label: Default Pixel Value

parameters.label: Windowed Sinc Interpolate Function Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters used for the Windowed Sinc interpolation

string-enumeration.name: windowFunction
string-enumeration.description:
Window Function 
h = Hamming 
c = Cosine 
w = Welch 
l = Lanczos 
b = Blackman
string-enumeration.label: Window Function

parameters.label: BSpline Interpolate Function Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters used for the BSpline interpolation

parameters.label: Manual Transform (Only used if no transform node set)

double-vector.name: transformMatrix
double-vector.description: 12 parameters of the transform matrix by rows ( --last 3 being translation-- )
double-vector.label: Transform Matrix

string-enumeration.name: transformType
string-enumeration.description: Transform algorithm\nrt = Rigid Transform\na = Affine Transform
string-enumeration.label: Transform
